# Ignore Python virtual environment directory
env/
.venv/
venv/

# Ignore Python virtual environment directories (PyCharm, etc.)
.pyvenv/

# Ignore compiled Python files
*.pyc
__pycache__/

# Ignore system-specific files or directories
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore IDE or editor specific files
.idea/
.vscode/

# Ignore any sensitive or environment-specific files
config.ini
.env

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore any other temporary or system-generated files
*.tmp

# Ignore any backup files
*.bak

# Ignore any database files
*.db

# Ignore config file with secrets
config.py
